channel.title: Scoundrals on Sherlock Homes
channel.description: Recent content in Scoundrals on Sherlock Homes

item.title: My name is Sherlock Holmes.
item.description: “My name is Sherlock Holmes. It is my business to know what other people don’t know.” â€•“The Adventure of the Blue Carbuncle” Little is known of Holmes’ early life or his family background, save that his grandmother was a sister of the French artist Vernet. An estimate of Holmes’s age in “His Last Bow” places his year of birth at 1854; the story, set in August 1914, describes him as 60 years of age.
